title: Your pictures: share your photos on the theme of ‘blaze’
text:
Wherever you are in the world, this week we’d like to see your pictures on the theme ‘blaze’

Your pictures: share your photos on the theme of ‘blaze’

The next theme for our weekly photography assignment, published in print in the Observer New Review is ‘blaze’.

Share your photos of what blaze means to you – and tell us about your image in the description box.

The closing date is Wednesday 30 October at 10am. We’ll publish our favourites in the New Review on Sunday 3 November.

How to share your photograph

You can share your ‘blaze’ pictures by filling out the form below. If you’re having trouble using the form, click here. Read terms of service here.
